name: Squatch (itch)
description:
Made for the Ludum Dare gamejam in 48 hours in August 2015.

http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-33/?action=preview&uid=49393

Squatch!
You play as a friendly Sasquatch - You long for friends, and food, and friends, and food -- A large list for such a simple being. Make your way to the Village to the South-East and find what you need! Be sure to eat any treats you find on the ground!

Timelapse!
